name: Enchanted Tomb
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND THERE WILL BE SOME MORE MECHANICS AND MORE LEVELS. THE GAME MAY STILL BE BUGGY.

In this game, you are a trapeze artist that finds mystical powers and you must escape the tomb after finding the artefact you need to get enough money to leave the circus. 

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS: MOVE AND JUMP

Z KEY: CHANGE ELEMENT

X KEY: SHOOT ELEMENT

C KEY: INTERACT(USE ON LEVERS)

Each magic ability can be used for different things. Earth to make earth platforms big enough to stand on. Lightning is used to power generators. Fire power is used to light torches.
